name: Analgesics
description: Used to relieve pain, commonly for headaches, muscle aches, and arthritis.

name: Antipyretics
description: Reduce fever by affecting the hypothalamus and promoting heat loss.

name: Antibiotics
description: Treat bacterial infections by killing or inhibiting bacteria growth.

name: Antivirals
description: Prevent or treat viral infections like flu, herpes, or HIV.

name: Antifungals
description: Used to treat fungal infections of the skin, nails, and body.

name: Antiparasitics
description: Treat infections caused by parasites like worms or protozoa.

name: Cardiovascular
description: Used to manage heart-related conditions like hypertension and arrhythmia.

name: Antidiabetics
description: Help control blood sugar levels in people with diabetes.

name: Respiratory Drugs
description: Treat respiratory issues like asthma, bronchitis, and COPD.

name: Central Nervous System (CNS) Drugs
description: Affect brain and spinal cord to treat pain, epilepsy, anxiety, and depression.

name: Gastrointestinal Drugs
description: Used for stomach and digestive problems such as acid reflux and diarrhea.

name: Immunological Agents
description: Boost or suppress the immune system for various immune-related diseases.

name: Hormonal / Endocrine Drugs
description: Regulate hormone levels for thyroid, growth, or reproductive issues.

name: Pediatric Medicines
description: Formulated specifically for infants, children, and adolescents.

name: Gynecological/Obstetric Medicines
description: Support women's reproductive health and pregnancy care.

name: Cancer Drugs (Oncology)
description: Used to treat cancer by killing or slowing the growth of cancer cells.

name: Ophthalmic Medicines
description: Treat eye-related conditions such as infections, dryness, or glaucoma.

name: ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) Drugs
description: Manage conditions of the ear, nose, and throat, including infections and allergies.

name: Musculoskeletal Drugs
description: Used for muscle, bone, or joint conditions like arthritis and inflammation.

name: Dermatological Drugs
description: Treat skin issues such as acne, eczema, fungal infections, or rashes.

name: Dental Medicines
description: Used to manage oral health issues including infections, pain, and gum disease.

name: Nutritional & Dietary Supplements
description: Support health with vitamins, minerals, and nutritional enhancements.

name: Diagnostic Agents
description: Aid in identifying diseases or conditions through tests and imaging.

name: Emergency / First Aid Drugs
description: Critical drugs for quick response in emergency and life-threatening situations.
